Captain's log, supplemental. We are arriving at the Cardassian
colony on Goralis II to provide aid and supplies, as requested
by the Castellan of the Union, Garak.
With Cardassia still rebuilding post-war, and with reparations
and a severely decreased military as part of the treaty, the
Union has been stretched very thin across their territory,
and have been relying on the Federation and civilian assistance.
In addition, the post-war Maquis Resurgence has been a thorn in
both Starfleet's and the Union Self-Defence Force's sides. They
have been violently unhappy with the treaty and the newfound
galactic support for the Union, resulting in attacks on colonies.
Our mission today is to secure Goralis II's sphere of influence
and assist our allies with aiding the colony. Several civilian
merchant ships and a small task force of Starfleet vessels have
Captain, we've arrived on the outskirts of Goralis II. Sensors
are detecting deuterium gas clouds nearby.
I suggest we peform a scan of the surrounding area, and then of
the gas clouds in case there are Maquis ships within.

What the hell?\. The Borg are all but destroyed\..\..\.. \n[30],
are you reading this?\. This doesn't scan like any past Cube that
Starfleet's encountered before.\. It's also experiencing power
All ships, regroup and form a defensive line!\. We need to buy time
for the civilian ships to escape in case the Borg Cube activates.
Transmit to all Starfleet ships, free-fire and engage once the
Once we deal with this we can rendezvous with all our ships.\.
Something is jamming our long-ranged comms as well. We're on our
own out here, let's hope our combined fleet can deal with it.
Captain Simpson, the Cardassian Self-Defense Forces are not well
enough equipped to deal with this. Our ships' firepower have been
woefully reduced by treaty. We won't be able to fend off a whole
Understood.\. Once the civilians are clear, Starfleet will provide
covering fire for your fleet to fall back as well. When you exit
jamming range, hail Starfleet Command and alert them of the
And what about the colonists, Captain?\. We can't just leave some
thousands of Cardassians to die, or worse, get assimilated!
Captain, Gul, USS Falcata here. Given our scans of the Borg Cube
and its fluctuating EM fields, I don't think it's a threat to the
colony.\. It appears to be in the middle of regenerating,\. meaning it
won't return fire on us and we should be able to destroy it.
Nonetheless, we should get the civilian and Cardassian ships to
evacuate the colonists. Comms, get that out to the civvie fleet.
Get as many people off Goralis II as they can before either the
Borg are destroyed, or the Cube awakens.
\n[30], that goes for the Maquis ships you salvaged too.
They'll be of no use against a whole Cube if it activates. Get
them to evacuate the colony and escort the civilian ships out
Agreed, Captain. We'll protect the civilian ships until they've
warped out, and we'll evacuate whoever we can after that.
We'll have to destroy that Cube, or hold the line as long as we

parameters.Description:
"
This is your crew's current opinion for you.
As your crew, they expect you to hold the standards and ideals of a Starfleet captain.
Failing to do so will cause them to react negatively and doubt your ability to command, resulting in your ship underperforming.
Being a model Starfleet captain will motivate them to work under you and you will gain benefits to your vessel.

\c[16]Current Standing:\c[0]
\c[3]Idolized\c[0]

\c[16]Current Effects:\c[0]
\c[3]Engineering Battle Logs\c[0]
Your crew has elected to keep engineering logs of past battles, allowing them to be more effective against plasma fires and hull breaches.
Engineering teams have also managed to maintain Tech points through battles as well.
They have also integrated systems with tactical teams, allowing you to perform two actions per turn."

"
This is your crew's current opinion for you.
As your crew, they expect you to hold the standards and ideals of a Starfleet captain.
Failing to do so will cause them to react negatively and doubt your ability to command, resulting in your ship underperforming.
Being a model Starfleet captain will motivate them to work under you and you will gain benefits to your vessel.

\c[16]Current Standing:\c[0]
\c[11]Honored\c[0]

\c[16]Current Effects:\c[0]
\c[3]Tactical Readiness\c[0]
Your crew has started performing tactical drills in their free time.
By improving their tactical readiness, your ship now counter-attacks more frequently.
As your crew is now more trained in combat, you can now perform two actions per turn as well."

Our shields and weapons are severely damaged, Captain.
We should repair them first before re-engaging in combat.
How do I repair my ship?
How do I repair my ship?
You can repair your ship by clicking the repair icon in the lower
right hand corner of your screen.
However, this only works for your starship, and not other vessels
under your command in your task force.
You can also select the "Engineering Repair Team" skill from the
computer menu when selecting a damaged ship in your task force.
This is how you can repair other ships under your command.
Help player how to repair if damaged
Captain, our shields and weapons were damaged in that battle.
We should repair them before engaging any other hostiles.

How do I repair my ship?
You can repair your ship by clicking the repair icon in the lower
right hand corner of your screen.
However, this only works for your starship, and not other vessels
under your command in your task force.
You can also select the "Engineering Repair Team" skill from the
computer menu when selecting a damaged ship in your task force.
This is how you can repair other ships under your command.

parameters.Name: Goralis II
parameters.Description:
"Goralis II is a Class K planet in Cardassian space near the Badlands.

After the Dominion War, it was colonized by the Cardassian Union.

In 2403, due to an incident that has been classified by Starfleet Command and the New Cardassian Union, all transit to the Goralis system has been restricted, and Goralis II has been placed under quarantine."
